name: 90 Degrees (Team 101)
description:
-90 Degrees is a fast-paced platformer game about a astronaut who happened to be in a bad situation where the generator of their ship broke and now the security system is acting weirdly and the turrets are shooting randomly. Our protagonist has to survive through the turrets and fix the generator as fast as possible by running through big platform and surviving the turrets.

Dev note: -90 degrees is not a finished game. This game was made for Brakeys Game Jam 2021.2. This is our first game so there are a lot of mistakes and problems with the game. Thank you for viewing our game.
